About Me

My name is Alyson Stephan, St. Joseph’s University student in her junior year. I am working toward obtaining a degree in 2015, in the fields on Communication Studies (my major) and Managing Human Capital (my minor). I am a transfer student to St. Joe’s; I previously attended Salisbury University in Maryland, where I was an Education major. I am however, originally from Sellersville, Pennsylvania, where I grew up with my parents and my sisters.

I am a personally driven, highly motivated individual, who is looking to obtain a career that allows me to express my full potential of creative energy. I am determined to achieve goals, whether they are set by me or for me and would enjoy a career that is challenging. I seek out leadership opportunities and have a yearning to prove people wrong. I hope to use my knowledge, skill, and degree to live creatively.
